title: Card Case, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on silk and  linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in stem and knot stitches on plain weave linen faced with plain weave silk
creditline: Gift of Marquis Val Verde de la Sierra
description: Card case of pale yellow silk embroidered in pink, blue and green silk in a floral design; lined with pale blue silk.
